1. Can you provide an example of a challenging graphics project you have worked on in the past? How did you approach it and what was the outcome?

2. In a fast-paced and deadline-driven environment, how do you prioritize multiple graphics projects simultaneously? Can you share an example of a time when you had to juggle multiple projects and how you successfully managed them?

3. How do you stay up-to-date with the latest design trends and techniques in the graphics industry? Can you provide an example of a time when you implemented a new design trend or technique into your work?

4. Graphic design often requires working with clients or stakeholders who may have different preferences or visions for a project. How do you handle conflicting feedback or design revisions? Can you share an example of a time when you successfully navigated such a situation?

5. Attention to detail is crucial in graphic design. Can you provide an example of a time when you discovered an error or inconsistency in a project at the last minute? How did you rectify the issue and ensure the final product met the required standards?
